service.name: cmsExportDataFormatInterface
service.description: CMS data export functionality formatting options

attribute.name: outputMode
attribute.description: Output mode - one of: SF_IL (inline result as resultText), SF_FS (single file on server), MF_FS (multi file on server), SF_DL (no result; causes executeExport=false and caller must use worker)

attribute.name: executeExport
attribute.description: If true, perform the export immediately; if false, the dataExportWorker is created, prepared and returned, but caller is responsible for invoking the right executeExport method (default: true)

attribute.name: outPath
attribute.description: Output location, either file for SF_FS or directory for MF_FS

attribute.name: maxRecordsPerFile
attribute.description: For multi-file output: max records per file (default: 0 - unlimited)

attribute.name: resultText
attribute.description: Inline output for SF_DL mode

attribute.name: dataExportWorker
attribute.description: Returns the data export worker instance used to generate the query

service.name: cmsExportDataOptionsInterface
service.description: CMS data export functionality processing options

attribute.name: presetConfigName
attribute.description: Name of a preset config that will be used to pre-fill other values such as targetEntityNames and influence behaviors

attribute.name: recordGrouping
attribute.description: Method by which the entities will be traversed and grouped - one of: NONE (default), ENTITY_TYPE, MAJOR_OBJECT

attribute.name: targetEntityNames
attribute.description: The entity names to query as part of the main query; NOTE: For MAJOR_OBJECT grouping only Major entities from this list are used, while non-major ones listed have no effect

attribute.name: exportFilesAsTextData
attribute.description: If true, all template files (DataResouce.objectInfo component://) will be read and output as ElectronicText records (default: false)

attribute.name: includeContentRefs
attribute.description: If true, Content/DataResource/Electronic records are output; if false, they are omitted entirely (default: true)

attribute.name: transTimeout
attribute.description: Transaction timeout, for each main entity query (default: 3600)

attribute.name: entityCond
attribute.description: Condition applied to every entity in the main query; NOTE: For MAJOR_OBJECT grouping, this is only applied to the main query entities and not the lateral-visiting related entities

attribute.name: entityDateCond
attribute.description: Date condition applied to every entity in the main query that supports timestamps; NOTE: For MAJOR_OBJECT grouping, this is only applied to the main query entities and not the lateral-visiting related entities

attribute.name: entityCondMap
attribute.description: Map of entity name to conditions to apply to it, for entities in the main query; NOTE: For MAJOR_OBJECT grouping, this is only applied to the main query entities and not the lateral-visiting related entities

attribute.name: mainEfo
attribute.description: EntityFindOptions to use on the main queries

attribute.name: useCommonEfo
attribute.description: If true, applies a common set of EntityFindOptions to the query; if false, does not apply any common find settings (default: false)

attribute.name: entityPkMap
attribute.description: Map of entity names to single-field PK values to target; WARN: only supports entities with single-field PK

attribute.name: entityNoPkFindAll
attribute.description: If true, entities part of targetEntityNames having no entries in entityPkMap or singlePkfEntityName simply do a find-all operation (no PK filter); if false, entities not named are excluded from the main query; WARN: entityNoPkFindAll=false only works properly for recordGrouping==MAJOR_OBJECT (default: true)

attribute.name: singlePkfEntityName
attribute.description: Same as entityPkMap, but designates a single entity name whose PK values should be listed in singlePkfIdList

attribute.name: singlePkfIdList
attribute.description: Single-field PK values to target for the entity named by singlePkfEntityName; WARN: only supports entities with single-field PK

attribute.name: attribTmplAssocType
attribute.description: For CmsAttributeTemplate main query, PAGE_TEMPLATE returns only page template attributes while ASSET_TEMPLATE returns only asset template attributes - one of: PAGE_TEMPLATE, ASSET_TEMPLATE

attribute.name: pmpsMappingTypeId
attribute.description: For CmsProcessMapping/CmsPageSpecialMapping main query, controls whether to include only special page mappings (),

attribute.name: includeMajorDeps
attribute.description: For MAJOR_OBJECT grouping: If true, during lateral traversal (through entity relations) we will include dependencies from Major entities other than the main queried one; if false, we only query the main major entity and its non-major related entities (default: false)

attribute.name: enterPresetConfigName
attribute.description: For MAJOR_OBJECT grouping: Name of a preset config whose entity names will be used to pre-fill the enterEntityNames parameter specifically

attribute.name: enterEntityNames
attribute.description: For MAJOR_OBJECT grouping: Limits which generic (non-major) entities we visit laterally (through entity relations) to the specified entities

attribute.name: enterMajorPresetConfigName
attribute.description: For MAJOR_OBJECT grouping: Name of a preset config whose entity names will be used to pre-fill the enterMajorEntityNames parameter specifically

attribute.name: enterMajorEntityNames
attribute.description: For MAJOR_OBJECT grouping: When includeMajorDeps==true, limits which Major entities we visit laterally (through entity relations) to the specified entities
